name: XML DB Schema Generator
short_description: XML DB Schema Generator is a collection of XSLT-Scripts and XML-Schemas used to generate DB-Schemas (HTML-Document, SQL, etc.) out of a simple XML-File, which describes the db schema in an abstract way.
